topic.title: Mapping an XML Schema Location Using an XML Catalog

Mapping a schema location using an XML catalog

body.p: The namespace of the root element of an XML document can be associated with an XML Schema using an XML catalog. If there is no xsi:schemaLocation attribute on the root element and the XML document is not matched with a document type, the namespace of the root element is searched in the XML Catalog preferences page.
If the XML catalog contains a uri or rewriteUri or delegateUri element, its schema will be used by the application to drive the content completion and document validation.
